item.title: World shares are mixed ahead of Trump's meeting with Zelenskyy
item.description: World shares are mixed ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's meeting with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and other European leaders

item.title: Qantas fined $59M for illegal pandemic layoffs
item.description: A judge has fined Qantas Airways $59 million for illegally firing over 1,800 ground staff at the start of the Covid-19 pandemic

item.title: Republicans look to make a U-turn on federal commitment to electric vehicles for the Postal Service
item.description: The U.S. Postal Service is facing congressional attempts to strip billions in federal EV funding

item.title: Air Canada says it is restarting flights Sunday
item.description: Air Canada says it plans to resume flights on Sunday after the Canadian government intervened and forced the airline and its striking flight attendant...
